TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from some of our satisfied customers about their experience using our app.
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app is a game-changer for discovering new and innovative products! The recommendations are always on point.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I love how this app curates the latest and greatest products across various categories. It's become my go-to for staying ahead of the curve.

CTA_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve and explore cutting-edge products from around the world. Our app curates the newest and most exciting offerings, giving you a front-row seat to the next big thing.
CTA_SUBTITLE: Fuel Your Curiosity, Spark Your Imagination
CTA_CONTENT_SUBTITLE: Unlock a World of Groundbreaking Ideas
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions about Discover New Products
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How does the app help find new products?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app uses advanced algorithms to scour the internet and identify the latest product releases across various categories. You can customize your preferences to get personalized recommendations tailored to your interests.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: What kinds of products can I find?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: You can discover new products spanning electronics, gadgets, home goods, fashion, beauty, and more. We have a vast database covering numerous brands and product types.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Is the app free to use?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes, the basic version of the app is completely free. We offer a premium subscription with additional features like early access to new product info and expert reviews.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: How often are new products added?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Our database is updated continuously as new products hit the market. You'll always have access to the latest and greatest product launches.
NEWSLETTER_BUTTON_CTA_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Sign Up to Get Insider Updates
HERO_SUBTITLE: Stay ahead of the curve with our cutting-edge product discovery platform.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about our product discovery app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app helps you find and explore the newest and trendiest products on the market. Stay ahead of the curve with our curated collection of innovative items.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How does the product discovery work?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Our algorithm scans the web for the latest product launches and trends. We also have a team of curators who handpick unique and interesting finds to feature.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I filter products by category?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes, you can filter products by various categories like technology, fashion, home goods, and more. This helps you quickly find new items relevant to your interests.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How often is the app updated with new products?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: We update our product catalog daily to ensure you always have access to the newest launches and trends as they hit the market.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is there a way to get notified about specific products?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Absolutely! You can set up alerts for specific product categories or even individual products you're interested in. We'll notify you as soon as they become available.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Stay Ahead of the Curve with Our Innovative Product Finder
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our app that curates the latest and greatest products from emerging brands and startups.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Our algorithm learns your preferences to suggest products tailored to your unique tastes and interests.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Get exclusive first looks and early bird access to highly anticipated product launches before they hit the mainstream.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Read in-depth reviews and behind-the-scenes insights from our team of product experts and industry insiders.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Seamlessly browse, compare, and purchase products from multiple brands and retailers within our user-friendly app.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Explore curated feeds showcasing the latest innovations across various categories like tech, home, fashion, and more.
